picks.text: The iPad Pro gets MagSafe charging, but it's not what you think…
picks.full-pick-text: The iPad Pro gets MagSafe charging, but it's not what you think… Not the MagSafe an iPhone has.
picks.notes:
• "Not the MagSafe an iPhone has."
  • In other words, an iPhone MagSafe charger will not charge an iPad Pro, but it will have a new charging method called MagSafe, likely the MacBook's MagSafe or very similar.
